title: Zesty chilli tiger prawns
description: A quick and tasty prawn stir-fry recipe.

default: 2 tbsp groundnut oil or vegetable oil
200g/7oz raw tiger prawns, shelled and de-veined
1 tbsp Shaoxing rice wine or dry sherry
75g/3oz French beans, topped and tailed, chopped into 1cm/½in pieces

steps: Heat a wok until smoking and add the groundnut oil, then add the garlic and chilli and stir fry for a few seconds. Add the prawns, rice wine and lime juice and stir fry for 2-3 minutes, or until the prawns start to turn pink.
Add the French beans and stir fry for another 2-3 minutes, or until the prawns are cooked through. Season, to taste, with the salt and chilli flakes.
Pile the chilli prawns onto a serving plate and serve immediately.
